mapper.select: SELECT ec.title, ec.cover, ec.lesson_num, subject_union.subject_level_one, subject_union.subject_level_two, et.name teacherName, CONVERT (ec.price, DECIMAL ( 8, 2 )) AS price FROM `edu_course` ec LEFT JOIN `edu_teacher` et ON ec.teacher_id = et.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT es1.title subject_level_one, es2.title subject_level_two, es2.id subject_id FROM `edu_subject` es1 INNER JOIN `edu_subject` es2 ON es2.parent_id = es1.id ) subject_union ON subject_union.subject_id = ec.subject_id WHERE ec.id = #{courseId}
